note: #SecondLife avatar and real life human. Inworld I like exploring, decorating, science discussion groups, socializing, music and dancing, and a bit of dressing up even if I'm a fashion failure. In real life I like animals, really bad B-movies, monster movies, sci-fi, science, reading, screaming rock and blues, driving way too fast, tea, coffee, really good chocolate, fuzzy slippers, and hiking in the mountains.
